Name: Azure Information Protection
Author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
Description:
The [Azure Information Protection](https://azure.microsoft.com/solutions/information-protection/) Solution for Microsoft Sentinel integrates Microsoft Azure Information Protection logs to view dashboards, create custom alerts, and improve investigation. 

**Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:**

 This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs: 

 a. [Azure Monitor Resource Diagnostics](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/essentials/diagnostic-settings)
